From the brand

Why choose our UV light flashlight instead of others?

Focus on R&D and Sales of Innovative UV Flashlights Series for 10 years! Come To Join Our Vansky Brand UV Flashlight Family With Over 10 Million Satisfied Customers!

What makes our products unique?

Our UV Flashlights are Made of Ultra-Tough High-precision Aluminum Throughout, and HD Brightness Led Lamp Beads are Like the Eyes of An Owl Looking for “PREY” at Night.

What kind of customer shopping experience can you get ?

With Experienced and Professional Team, Vansky Continuously Pursues Innovation and Sound Growth, and are Striving to Provide Customer An Extraordinary and Comfortable Shopping Experience.

Vansky UV Light Flashlight

Find invisible stains: UV flashlight helps detect food stains and pet urine stains on rugs, carpets, and clothes that are otherwise invisible to the naked Eye. Not work well on cat urine
Versatile use: authenticate currency and official documents like drivers licenses or identify unwanted whitening agent in cosmetics
Perfect for outside use such as finding scorpions and minerals! Shoul used with 3xAA Standard Alkaline Battery (Battery Not Included)

Emits 390 to 395 nanometer wavelength

The strong Aluminum alloy body makes this product durable and long lasting, and the large head with 51 LED makes this flashlight brighter than others products.

  • Can only spot dried urine stain;
  • Does not work on reflective surface or carpet with fluoresce;
  • The ultraviolet led black light works best in dark environment, the darker it is, the better it works;
  • For few dark color carpets, the reflected stain color will be very close to the color of the carpet, making it harder to see;
  • Remove all batteries if you did not intend to use it for a long time.

From the brand

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, thatâ€™s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

Raised Garden Bed

POTEY PLANT STAND & SHELF

POTEY Raise Beds

Create Beautiful Green Garden

ã€Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouseã€‘This galvanized raised garden bed kit contains a planting bed, a greenhouse, and 2 greenhouse covers. With our perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year. POTEY raised garden beds size: 5.4 L * 1.6 W *0.8 H (FT), greenhouse cover size: 2.3 W * 2.5 H (FT).
ã€2 Different Use Greenhouse Coverã€‘POTEY raised garden bed come with PE cover and PE net, PE cover used for winter, to keep warm, and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperature; PE net used for summer, to protect your vegetables and plants while ventilating.
ã€Innovative Soil Ventilation Holesã€‘Creating a planting environment in a plant box is different from the natural environment, where soil respiration is vital. Our plant box is equipped with vent holes that can replace fresh oxygen, making sure the plant roots grow well and strong.
ã€Strong Connecting rodsã€‘In order to keep the garden box more stable, we added 2 connecting rods in the middle of the garden box. Compared to other planting beds without rods or using thin iron sheets as rods, our connecting rods are more durable and have a long service life.
ã€Thickened Materialã€‘Galvanized raised garden beds are made of solid steel plates galvanized layer which average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time. If you have any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, and we will solve your problems ASAP.

POTEY Galvanized Raised Garden Bed with Greenhouse

Why Choose Potey?

Bring your home to life with our extensive range of planting products. From planters, plant hangers, plant stands, garden statues and raise beds to grow lights, we have everything a stylish plant lover needs.

Decorative products that make life more beautiful and comfortable, thatâ€™s what POTEY stands for. Create a pretty home for your plants to live in and add heaps of character to your garden with the selection of our beautiful products.

More reasons you’ll love this raised garden bed:

With Two Different Use Greenhouse Covers – The raised garden bed is equipped with a PE cover to keep plants warm in winter and prevent vegetables and plants from being affected by low temperatures; equipped with a PE net used in summer to protect plants from insects.

High-Quality Thickened Material – The raised garden bed outdoor is made of solid steel plates galvanized layer, the average thickness of galvanized sheet reaches 0.6mm, can stay in contact with the soil for a long time, and is resistant to corrosion. Maintains its original shape even after many years of use.

Easy to Installation – This planter box outdoors is easy to install, with instructions detailing every step of the product’s installation details and a clear and concise installation video to assist you with the installation.

POTEY-GARDEN BEDS KIT PACKAGING INCLUDES:
  • Straight iron sheet * 6
  • Curved iron sheet * 4
  • Connecting rod * 2
  • Installed screw * 1 ï¼ˆboxï¼‰
  • Clamps * 8
  • PE Plant Fabric * 2
  • Greenhouse Hoops * 4
  • PVC Transparent Pipe * 3

POTEY Raised Garden Beds with Cover

Two practical protective covers

POTEY continuously optimizes its products based on market research and customer feedback; this upgraded planter boxes outdoor has 2 different greenhouse covers to meet the growing needs of plants throughout the year.

POTEY found that plant lovers would like to have their own open space to experience planting and explore plant secrets. At this time, POTEY garden beds are the best choice.

  • ADVANTAGE – Surround air vents on all sides
  • ADVANTAGE – Suitable for growing needs of any plant
  • ADVANTAGE – Reasonably sized for most usage scenarios
  • ADVANTAGE – Strong connecting rod ensures long-term stability
  • ADVANTAGE – All parts are made of more than 0.6mm metal materials

Read more

SHOW BETTER PRODUCT DETAILS

Multiple Sets of Vent Holes

  • Simulate natural land respiration
  • Make sure the soil has enough oxygen during plant growth
  • Avoid soil compaction

Metal Material

  • Galvanized
  • More than 6mm thickness
  • Overall solid steel material
  • Not easy to corrode, rust

Strong Connecting Rods

  • Ensuring that the garden bed does not deform during long-term use
  • Most garden beds do not have rods, they will deform, fall apart, and collapse under long-term soil compression

Read more

PE cover for winter warmth

The combination of the galvanized raised garden bed and the PE greenhouse cover ensures that the plants are kept warm in the cold winter, preventing the vegetables and plants from being affected by the low temperature.

PE net for summer insect control

Build a PE net outside the raised garden bed, which can not only keep the planter boxes outdoor ventilated and easily absorb water, but also protect the plants from insects.

2 Different Use Greenhouse Covers

With this perfectly matches combo set, no need to buy each of them separately, to make sure your favorite planting grows well through the whole year.

Read more

Plants can be grown in raised garden beds with greenhouse all year round to create a beautiful courtyard.

[Usable both indoors and outdoors] With a rugged design, the bed is suited for everyday use, both indoors and outdoors.
[Isolation of moisture and cold] The size is about 42x45x 23cm. Large enough to keep pets away from hot, cold or dirty floors while resting or sleeping.
[Simple maintenance] The lid can be removed. Drainage is also great. It dries quickly in the shade. It also has a higher drying speed than polyurethane and hard cotton.
[Conenient storage] Because the product includes basic assembly, you can fold it into a bag when not in use, so it’s easy to store.
[Adaptable] It can be used with cats,small and medium-sized dogs , etc.

Give your cats a lovely bed as a Christmas present, sharing love and happiness together in the new year.

Our cat hammock allows cats to sleep restfully

Cats especially enjoy sleeping in small, suspended locations. Our design takes into account the specific characteristics of cats and is loved by cats of all kinds.

Our net structure is breathable.

Our cat hammock can help prevent scratches, is made from breathable material, is simple to clean, water resistant, and is suitable for year-long use.

Our cat hammock has a suspended design, so it is cool even in the summertime. Your cat will also keep warm during the winter, because the hammock does not make direct contact with the floor.

Read more

The hammock’s soft touch will help your cat sleep restfully

The sunken cat bed design and soft touch will give your cat a sense of security, so your cat will go to sleep in peace.

Read more

The best gift for a cat

Our package makes an excellent gift for any cat or a friend who happens to be a cat lover.

Freedom of movement

The design is safe and stable, allowing pets to move and use the hammock at will. This allows your cat to stay with you.
